Package view

Class CanvasFigure

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
view.CanvasFigure
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, Observer
public class CanvasFigure
extends javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
implements Observer
Figure Display

This class is used to manage the display of the Figure

Author:
Groupe G1 Implements Observer exctends Canvas

      public CanvasFigure​(double width, double height)

      width - The width of your Canvas
      height - The height of your Canvas

    • CanvasFigure

      public CanvasFigure​(View view)
      Create the Canvas of the Figure with the default width and height

      DEFAULT_WIDTH = 800
      DEFAULT_HEIGHT = 500

      Parameters:
      view -

    • printFigureLite

      public void printFigureLite()
      Draw the Figure without convert the coordinate

      This function is useful if you have only do minor change on the CanvasFigure and not on the Figure

      See Also:
      printFigure()
